      Experience

      • Job title

      • Timeframe you worked at this position

            Having a comprehensive list of skills will help get your profile noticed by connections and recruiters. When recruiters search for candidates, skills will be one of the criteria they use.
            If you’re not sure what to include, review the list below of the top LinkedIn skills. Before you add a skill, make sure it matches the job responsibilities in your profile and on your resume. Prospective employers will notice if there’s a mismatch.

            I study how the design, affordances and choice architectures on digital screens affect users' behavior, thought patterns, relationships and general wellbeing. And using the intersection of behavioral science, cognitive neuroscience, psychology, habit-formation, social systems and ethics, I help invent and advocate for new designs that embed mindfulness into the screens people use.
